title: S&P 500 Bottom-Fishers Eye Next Support Levels as Rout Deepens
description: A spiraling tech stock selloff has the S&P 500 Index hovering just above a key technical trend line, with traders poring over charts to determine how much further the equity benchmark might fall.
content: A spiraling tech stock selloff has the S&P 500 Index hovering just above a key technical trend line, with traders poring over charts to determine how much further the equity benchmark might fall.
